sentence: Conic sections can also be described by a set of points in the coordinate plane.
concepts: set of points in the coordinate plane

sentence: Later in this chapter, we will see that the graph of any quadratic equation in two variables is a conic section.
concepts: graph of any quadratic equation in two variables

sentence: The signs of the equations and the coefficients of the variable terms determine the shape.
concepts: signs of the equations and the coefficients of the variable terms

sentence: This section focuses on the four variations of the standard form of the equation for the ellipse.
concepts: variations of the standard form of the equation for the ellipse
standard form of the equation for the ellipse

sentence: An ellipse is the set of all points (x,y)(x,y) in a plane such that the sum of their distances from two fixed points is a constant.
concepts: set of all points ( x , y ) ( x , y )
set of all points ( x , y ) ( x , y ) in a plane
concepts_with_verbs: sum of their distances from two fixed points

sentence: Each fixed point is called a focus (plural: foci).
We can draw an ellipse using a piece of cardboard, two thumbtacks, a pencil, and string.
concepts: piece of cardboard , two thumbtacks , a pencil , and string
cardboard , two thumbtacks , a pencil , and string

sentence: Place the thumbtacks in the cardboard to form the foci of the ellipse.
concepts_with_verbs: cardboard to form the foci of the ellipse

sentence: Cut a piece of string longer than the distance between the two thumbtacks (the length of the string represents the constant in the definition).
Tack each end of the string to the cardboard, and trace a curve with a pencil held taut against the string.
concepts_with_verbs: Tack each end of the string to the cardboard , and trace a curve with a pencil
